_aLatestUpdates._sText:
-fixed an issue where the skybox was buggy and the map was duplicated, which could lead to performance issues and errors

-fixed an issue where the water was not clear and it didn't reflect light

-appearance of the sea has been improved, now the water goes far beyond the horizon, which looks more natural

-added water in the fountain on the B plant

-fixed ramps geometry

-improved scaffolding collision

-improved invisible walls near the cafe next to A plant

-minor texture improvements

-fixed missing texture on a house near the ladder next to a church's square

-updated map design

-added new props and decorations

-added flowerbed near the CT spawn

-added new passage to the B plant from the CT spawn

-invisible walls on the left side of T spawn were worked so now you can get inside the van

-minor texture and geometry fixes

_sText:
de_lesina is a bomb defuse map inspired by beautiful city in a south Italy. The main attraction of this map is Lesina Cathedral recreated in CS:S, located near the coast.

The map structure itself is a slightly modified copy of the local streets.

Have fun!

I would like to thank those people who leave their feedback, it helped me a lot to improve the map.
